extension.valueString: This value set is created solely to support early FHIR HAPI server requirements to have all members of a value set in the compose. Because of this, the member list is a point in time snapshot of the content. The value set resource with the compose element to be used in up-to-date systems is identified in the athoritativeSource extension.

name: oncology_specialty_designations
title: oncology specialty designations
publisher: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC)
purpose: NUCC oncology provider types who may provide encounters to patients with cancer

extension.valueString: Provider type indentifiers for oncology care
NUCC provider types with the word "oncology" in the description
